sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPINELLO, a Tuſcan painter, of great repute in his time. He painted a picture of the fallen angels, in which he drew ſo horrid a picture of Lucifer, that it frightened him ſo much as to affect his ſenſes ever after. He flouriſhed about the year 1 380.
